Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the transfer of funds into the metropolitan transportation authority aid trust account and the public transportation system operating assistance account
Summary: Relates to the transfer of funds into the metropolitan transportation authority aid trust account and the public transportation system operating assistance account.
LawCode: Amd §1105, Tax L; amd §§92-ff & 88-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to the transfer of funds into the metropolitan transportation authority aid trust account and the public transportation system operating assistance account
